attributes.action: Make icehockey a sport at all schools and make it a regular sport people play
attributes.additional_details: As I said before it’s a sport some people want to play and they can’t as it’s in the USA (and Canada) more than the uk
attributes.background: You should add (ice)hockey because it’s a sport some people want to play and enjoy , also if you do , make a hockey shop (ice hockey) for all the gear and equipment needed to play the sport!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what sports to offer at school are a matter for individual schools, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The sale of sports equipment are a matter for individual retailers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
